title: Region
description: An implicit region defined relative to an ellipsoid that is centered at the local space origin.

semiMajorAxisRadius.description: The radius of the reference ellipsoid along its semi-major axis in meters.

semiMinorAxisRadius.description: The radius of the reference ellipsoid along its semi-minor axis in meters.

heightFromSurface.description: The height of this region from the surface of the reference ellipsoid in meters.

bounds.description: The optional bounds of the region.
